comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Thanks you guys - it's nice to meet everyone!  BigBean, when I moved into that office we had no money for paint and the walls were this ugly dirty gray tack board.  We grabbed all this Brooklyn Museum-cyan-blue-go-team-go craft paper and spent a day tacking that paper up over boards.  It totally has this very scrappy-doo feeling when you walk in the place.  I think most people have no idea what to make of it, but I had to get rid of that original color :)

comment.author: 83877518@N00
comment._content:

Greetings from Schleswig-Holstein

comment.author: 87914514@N00
